name: Auto-Commit on File Update
description: Automatically commits and pushes updated files to GitHub

action.prompt:
A file has been saved: {{filePath}}

Perform the following:
1. Stage the file: git add {{filePath}}
2. Create a descriptive commit message based on the file changes
3. Commit: git commit -m "<your message>"
4. Push to GitHub: git push

Generate a clear, concise commit message that describes what was changed in the file.
